original_text: “But he refused. Instead, he went off and had the man thrown into prison until he could pay the debt.
korean_text: 허락하지 아니하고 이에 가서 그가 빚을 갚도록 옥에 가두거늘

sentences.original_text: and had the man thrown into prison
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 사람을 감옥에 던져 넣게 했다

sentences.original_text: until he could pay the debt
